hypothesis_content.title: SOL High-Beta Momentum Amplification Post-BTC Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a confirmed BTC daily close >2% above its 20-day SMA during a BULL or NEUTRAL regime, SOL will outperform BTC by at least 1.5x over the next 3 trading days, provided SOL's daily RSI(14) is between 40-70 at trigger.
hypothesis_content.rationale: SOL acts as a high-beta proxy to BTC. When BTC shows renewed strength after consolidating near its medium-term average, risk-on flows often rotate into high-beta alts like SOL, amplifying momentum.
entry_conditions: BTC daily close > 2% above its 20-day SMA
Enter SOL/BTC ratio long at next open

exit_conditions.take_profit: SOL/BTC ratio increases by 3% (1.5x BTC move)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: SOL/BTC ratio fails to increase or underperforms BTC after a confirmed BTC breakout, indicating lack of altcoin rotation.
